alert.note: Alert for Outagamie (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 28 at 5:31PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Outagamie County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Up to two inches of rain have already fallen. Up to another inch of rain is possible the next hour or two. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... New London, Black Creek, Greenville, Dale, Hortonville, Medina, Shiocton, Bear Creek, Nichols and Mackville.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
